bibl.title: The Soter Family: Genealogy and Onomastics.
bibl.note: "We will only consider the objects and inscriptions that point to a (possible) relationship with Soter, with an emphasis on their genealogical and onomastic riches. Our sources, the 'Soternalia', are listed at the end of the article [pp.81-82]".

bibl.title: Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period

bibl.seg: VAN LANDUYT K., The Soter Family: Genealogy and Onomastics.

S.P. VLEEMING (Ed.), Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVII (Leiden, 1995) pp. 69-82, 1 arbre généal., fac-sim.

"We will only consider the objects and inscriptions that point to a (possible) relationship with Soter, with an emphasis on their genealogical and onomastic riches. Our sources, the 'Soternalia', are listed at the end of the article [pp.81-82]".
